article: russia 's black sea fleet boosted security at its navigational facilities on sunday amid a dispute with ukraine over a lighthouse linked to the fleet in the crimean city of yalta , a navy spokesman said .
abstract: russia 's black sea fleet beefs up security after lighthouse seizure
